description: BitCurator is an Ubuntu-based Linux distribution designed to support the needs of library, archive, and museum professionals processing born-digital materials.
notes:
**⚠️ WARNING – IMAGE CURRENTLY UNDER TROUBLESHOOTING ⚠️**

This BitCurator 5 image is still being actively worked on and may exhibit issues. It includes a suite of open source disk imaging, digital forensics, and data analysis tools curated to support modern born-digital archival workflows. See the image’s information page for details.
